description: This file is the main source code for a Flutter-based mobile audiobook app. It defines UI components, app state management, and core logic including an audiobook model, a simulated audio player, store and library management, and UI screens for browsing, purchasing, and playback.

classes.name: AudioPlayerSimulator
classes.description: Simulates an audio player with basic playback, pause, seek, and progress update functionalities for demonstration purposes.

classes.name: Audiobook
classes.description: Immutable model representing an audiobook with attributes like ID, title, author, image URL, duration, description, and price.

classes.name: AudiobookAppModel
classes.description: State management class using Provider pattern; manages audiobook store, user library, playback state, and local storage.

classes.name: _PlayerUI
classes.description: Internal widget managing playback UI controls, including play/pause, seek slider, and time display.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes environment and runs the app with state provided.
